HediffDef.label: Freeze
HediffDef.description: The intense cold air has caused the body to be on the verge of freezing. If you are exposed to cold air above your limit, your body will freeze.

HediffDef.label: Blacksmith Instruction
HediffDef.description: The state is taking care of the work by looking at the forging instructions. During the activation of this state, there is a low probability that the item will be created one step higher in quality than usual.\n\nIt will also create items of at least Good quality for the duration of the effect.
